title: The Making of 'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid'
creator_credit: George Roy Hill, Ronald Preissman and Films Incorporated
brief_description: Traces the development of the major scenes in the feature film, “Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid”, showing sets, staging of action and casting of characters. Paul Newman, Robert Redford and director George Roy Hill comment on personal relationships between actors and directors. Suitable for secondary level.
